revised_title: Three-dimensional Instabilities in Steady and Unsteady Non-parallel Boundary Layers
tldr: This article investigates the linear stability of steady and unsteady two- and three-dimensional incompressible boundary layers with non-parallel basic flows. The study focuses on the effects of non-parallelism on the growth rate of instability waves and how it influences the direction of maximum linear growth. The research also explores the impact of cross flow on Tollmien-Schlichting instabilities and provides insights into other instabilities and interactions, linear and nonlinear.
